text:
:champagne: _You have opened a new, empty shared channel._ 
_Share <https://www.smooz.io/room/5e7a524f5809230004da25af|this link> with other teams to invite them in it_
<@U4VR52RQE> has renamed the channel from "z-shared-23" to "toby-and-amy"
name: toby-and-amy

text:
Hey Amy, please meet Toby your incredible E-Mentor we've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or penny-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
Hey Amy, hope all is going ok for you in the crazy period we are in!

quick blurb about my background:
So I am currently a lead animator in VFX at a company called Rodeo FX in Montreal
originally i went to uni for animation, and ended up working as a matchmover in vfx. I did that for a year or so and then I did animation mentor.
Of the back of that I got work on an animated feature that never got off the ground :disappointed: and then I moved around doing commercials in London for a little bit
and did some stints at places like Cinesite in London. Spent a little time doing games and then went back to commercials doing a mix of matchmoving and animation
and over the course of a year or two transitioned to just doing animation, then I moved to Montreal. Where I worked at Framestore and MPC as a senior animator.
and eventually moved to Rodeo, where I have been for about 2 years and a half and now I am a lead animator there

here is my latest reel
<https://vimeo.com/311157609>

Id love to hear a little about your path to where you are now, and what you would like to get out of this mentoring.

Currently i have 3 other mentees on this platform. One is pre university so still making quite broad choices about hwat she wants to do, another is in the final year on uni and wanting to get mroe into character animation, and another who has finished uni but looking to get into the animation work environment.

But essentially this can be anythign you want it to be.
